attributes.action: All cyclists registered with a visible number and have publicliability Inusrance
attributes.additional_details: Seeing them jump lights and near missing pedestrians or cutting dangerously into traffic especially into London. There needs to be protection when they scratch cars or run into ppl and some form of ID
attributes.background: All cyclist need insurance and registration to protect other road users and pedestrians. We need a way to recognise them when causing injury, accident and jumping crossings. There behaviour is a time outrageous as they know they cannot be traced and reported as easily as a vehicle
